price: 27. (Kasi) soki simisi naye epasuki na sima, akosi, mpe ye (Yûsuf) azali kati ya balobi bosôló.
arabic: وَإِن كَانَ قَمِيصُهُۥ قُدَّ مِن دُبُرٖ فَكَذَبَتۡ وَهُوَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kāna qamīṣuhu qudda min duburin fakadhabat wahuwa mina al-ṣādiqīna
